short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters Amazon's homepage to show only the search bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your Amazon shopping experience with the Amazon Homepage Filter extension. This tool transforms the busy Amazon homepage into a clean, distraction-free interface featuring only the essential search bar.

Key features:
- Removes all clutter from the Amazon homepage
- Presents a minimalist interface with just the search functionality
- Works on multiple Amazon homepage URLs
- Helps you focus on finding what you need without distractions
- Easy to toggle on and off

Perfect for users who want a more streamlined shopping experience or those who find the standard Amazon homepage overwhelming. Boost your productivity and reduce impulse purchases by focusing solely on your search intentions.

Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Amazon. It modifies the appearance of the Amazon website for user convenience.
